thread.title: Rebecca Oliverodiaz
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Rebecca Oliverodiaz

author: Rebecca Oliverodiaz
title: Rebecca Oliverodiaz
text: Michelle who works at the storage on 38th of Lawton, Oklahoma is AWESOME. Very sweet and understanding and very very helpful. Made my experience excellent. Will be referring friends and coworkers to rent with them if they are in need of a storage unit
